headline: 3 top stock picks: How to play 'Liberation Day losers'
summary: Portfolio Wealth Advisors president and chief investment officer Lee Munson sits down with Julie Hyman to share three "Liberation Day losers" — stocks that tumbled since April, coinciding with President Trump's new tariff policies at the time — that the strategist sees as opportunities for value plays. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Morning Brief.

content.title: 3 top stock picks: How to play 'Liberation Day losers'
content.description:
Portfolio Wealth Advisors president and chief investment officer Lee Munson sits down with Julie Hyman to share three "Liberation Day losers" — stocks that tumbled since April, coinciding with President Trump's new tariff policies at the time — that the strategist sees as opportunities for value plays.

To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Morning Brief.
